snippet: Mario Carta, who owns Casimir, a French bistro in the East Village, is opening an uptown version; a new restaurant from the Project Group; and openings in the Hamptons.
abstract: Restaurants Greenwich Project, Mulberry & Vine, Omar's, One Twenty-Two First Avenue, and Supreme Burger open in New York City; BLT Steak at the Capri, Delmonico's of Southampton, Fresh, Madison & Main, Red Hook Lobster Pound, Sienna Restaurant TBar and Swedish Culinary Summer open in the Hamptons.
lead_paragraph: Mario Carta, who owns Casimir, a French bistro in the East Village, is opening an uptown version; a new restaurant from the Project Group; and openings in the Hamptons.

headline.seo: Off the Menu: Casimir & Co Opening Uptown and More Restaurant Openings
